actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives relating to the closure, realignment, or downsizing of military installations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make dislocated employees eligible for the targeted jobs credit. Defines a dislocated employee as an individual: (1) who was employed on a military installation; and (2) whose job was terminated as a result of the closing or realignment of such installation under a defense base closure law or a reduction in force at such installation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives relating to the closure, realignment, or downsizing of military installations.
